title: (x) Classic script-like serif face - Raphael {Nicolai}
content:
Hi all,   
  
My name is Dag Henning Brandsaeter. Im new to this forum, or- that is ive been reading it for quite a while, but this will be my first post.   
   
I saw this beautiful type in a magazine editorial, and   
Id really like to find out what face it is. Any help is much appreciated. Sorry for the low res pictures, but its the best   
ive got rght now.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013143907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39474.jpg) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013143907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39475.jpg) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013143907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39476.jpg)   
   
   
   
/   
   
Dag Henning Brandsaeter,   
   
exclusiveandlovely.net   
qua.nl
author: DagBrandsaeter

comments.content:
Welcome to Typophile :-D   
   
The font you are looking for is [Raphael](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013143907/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=raphael)

thanks Nicolai!   
I really appreciate your help,   
   
best,   
dag
